\documentclass[turkish]{eqconf}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}

\makeatletter
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
%%% Optional Math Operation: Makes bold greek letters more bold
\usepackage{upgreek}   %Needed for Matrix Greek Letters
\usepackage{pdfrender} %Needed for Matrix Greek Letters
\newcommand*{\boldgreek}[1]{%
	\textpdfrender{%
		TextRenderingMode=FillStroke,%
		LineWidth=.35pt,%
	}{#1}%
}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\usepackage{xkeyval}

\usepackage[style=authoryear,style=authoryear,maxcitenames=2,maxbibnames=10, doi=false,isbn=false,url=false,eprint=false,giveninits]{biblatex}
\addbibresource{examplebib.bib}

\begin{document}
\title{This is Title}
\author{\authorname{1}{Baris Erkus}{} ve \authorname{2}{Ahmet Mehmet}{}}
\date{\affils{1}{Professor}{}\\
\affils{2}{Professor}{}\\
\email{bariserkus@itu.edu.tr}}
\maketitle
\begin{ozet}
Baris Erkus
\end{ozet}

\begin{anahtarkelimeler}
Kw1, Kw2
\end{anahtarkelimeler}

\begin{abstract}
Baris Erkus
\end{abstract}

\begin{keywords}
Kw1, Kw2
\end{keywords}

\thispagestyle{firststyle}  % Do not remove
\fixturkishbug   % Do not remove

\section{GİRİŞ}

test

\noindent test

\subsection{Baris Erkus}

\begin{equation}
\boldgreek{\alpha}=\boldgreek{\upphi}
\end{equation}


\subsubsection*{Test}

\cite{AtikAbrahamson2010}
\printbibliography

\end{document}
